info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 9:50PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF BRIEF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OTSEGO...CHENANGO...AND CORTLAND COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of locally heavy snow accompanied by winds of 25 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one-half mile. A quick coating to 1 inch of snow is expected. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 948 PM EST, an area of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Homer to Mc Donough to Norwich and near Oneonta and moving southeast at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Cortland, Oneonta, Norwich, Sidney, Homer, Guilford, Virgil, Oxford, Solon and Cincinnatus. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 9 and 12. Interstate 88 between 13 and 17. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
